text: ah ok and is MakieTex.jl supposed to support also .tex output? Or is it restricted to support LaTeX stuff within makie plots?

elements.text: ah ok and is MakieTex.jl supposed to support also .tex output? Or is it restricted to support LaTeX stuff within makie plots?

text: I think it's supposed to be for importing LaTeX stuff, not for exporting. It's probably also incompatible by now?

elements.text: I think it's supposed to be for importing LaTeX stuff, not for exporting. It's probably also incompatible by now?

text: I have the same feeling, but can't tell for sure

elements.text: I have the same feeling, but can't tell for sure

text: Yes it's meant for getting latex strings displayed in makie. It was a test project that Anshul made but he hasn't been around for a while, so if someone wants to pick up where he left off, that would be an option.

elements.text: Yes it's meant for getting latex strings displayed in makie. It was a test project that Anshul made but he hasn't been around for a while, so if someone wants to pick up where he left off, that would be an option.
